mapper.select:
select count(f.board_num) as count from free_board f
where
f.board_category=#{board_category}
and
f.board_subject like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
f.id like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')

select f.board_num, f.id, f.board_subject, f.board_content, f.board_readcount, f.board_date, f.board_category, ifnull((select sum(vote_up-vote_down) from free_board_vote fv where fv.board_num = f.board_num group by fv.board_num),0) as vote_total, ifnull((select sum(vote_up) from free_board_vote fv where fv.board_num= f.board_num group by fv.board_num),0) as vote_up, ifnull((select sum(vote_down) from free_board_vote fv where fv.board_num= f.board_num group by fv.board_num),0) as vote_down, ifnull((select count(reply_num) from free_board_reply fr where fr.board_num = f.board_num group by fr.board_num),0) as count_reply, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,f.board_date,now()) as year, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,f.board_date,now()) as month, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,f.board_date,now()) as day, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,f.board_date,now()) as hour, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTe,f.board_date,now()) as minute, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,f.board_date,now()) as second from free_board f
where
f.board_category=#{board_category}
and
f.board_subject like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
f.id like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
order by vote_total desc
order by f.board_date desc
limit #{startrow},#{limit}

select f.board_num, f.id, f.board_subject, f.board_content, f.board_readcount, f.board_date, f.board_category, ifnull((select sum(vote_up) from free_board_vote fv where fv.board_num= f.board_num group by fv.board_num),0) as vote_up, ifnull((select sum(vote_down) from free_board_vote fv where fv.board_num= f.board_num group by fv.board_num),0) as vote_down, ifnull((select count(reply_num) from free_board_reply fr where fr.board_num = f.board_num group by fr.board_num),0) as count_reply, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,f.board_date,now()) as year, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH,f.board_date,now()) as month, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,f.board_date,now()) as day, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,f.board_date,now()) as hour, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTe,f.board_date,now()) as minute, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND,f.board_date,now()) as second from free_board f where f.board_num=#{board_num}

select f.reply_num as reply_num, f.id as id, f.board_num as board_num, f.reply_content as reply_content, f.reply_re_ref as reply_re_ref, f.reply_re_lev as reply_re_lev, f.reply_re_seq as reply_re_seq, f.reply_re_id as reply_re_id, f.reply_date as reply_date, f.reply_file as reply_file, '0' as ct, f.reply_re_ck as reply_re_ck from free_board_reply f where f.board_num=#{board_num} order by f.reply_re_ref desc,f.reply_re_seq asc
mapper.update: update free_board set board_readcount= board_readcount+1 where board_num = #{board_num}
mapper.select: select vote_num,id,vote_date,board_num,vote_up,vote_down from free_board_vote where board_num=#{board_num} and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from free_board_vote where board_num=#{board_num} and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update free_board_vote set vote_up = vote_up+1 , vote_down= vote_down-1 where board_num=#{board_num} and id=#{id}
update free_board_vote set vote_up= vote_up-1, vote_down=vote_down+1 where board_num=#{board_num} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select max(f.reply_num) as reply_re_ref from free_board_reply f

choose.when: update free_board_reply set reply_content = #{reply_content},reply_file=#{reply_file} where reply_num=#{reply_num}
choose.otherwise: update free_board_reply set reply_content = #{reply_content} where reply_num=#{reply_num}

mapper.update: update free_board f set f.board_date_result=#{board_date_result} where f.board_num=#{board_num}
